metadata.title: USN-6363-1 -- curl vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that curl incorrectly handled certain large headers. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause curl to consume resources, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6363-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libcurl4-gnutls-dev - 7.88.1-8ubuntu2.2 libcurl4-openssl-dev - 7.88.1-8ubuntu2.2 libcurl3-gnutls - 7.88.1-8ubuntu2.2 libcurl4-doc - 7.88.1-8ubuntu2.2 libcurl3-nss - 7.88.1-8ubuntu2.2 libcurl4-nss-dev - 7.88.1-8ubuntu2.2 libcurl4 - 7.88.1-8ubuntu2.2 curl - 7.88.1-8ubuntu2.2 No subscription required
